final_answer.explanation: The actor who played Egon Spengler in Ghostbusters is Harold Ramis. He was the original head writer of the Canadian sketch comedy show Second City Television (SCTV), which ran from 1976 to 1984. During his time on SCTV, Ramis contributed significantly to the show's comedic style and legacy, helping to shape its unique approach to sketch comedy. SCTV became known for its innovative sketches and parodies, influencing many future comedy programs.
final_answer.answer: Second City Television (SCTV) ran from 1976 to 1984.
